New week, fresh bakes! 
Start your Monday right, pastries await in the breakout area across all our offices in UAE.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-4-min.png> 	

Evacuation Drills: Why They Matter

Evacuation drills may seem routine, but they are critical to ensuring your safety and the safety of your colleagues in the event of a real emergency. 

Click here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1144&user=10620>  to discover essential tips for taking these drills seriously and staying prepared.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1144&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-3-min.png> 	

WEEKLY INTERNAL OPPORTUNITIES

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1145&user=10620> 	

Visit our Chalhoub Career Site <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1145&user=10620> for all our vacancies and use your Chalhoub email address to be recognized as Internal!  

You can also refer your network directly through our Internal Referral Platform <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1146&user=10620>  – let’s grow our Group together!
